data.name: Crawling Silence
data.detailed_description:
Release:

Get notified when Crawling Silence is released by adding it to your wishlist!


About the Game

Crawling Silence is a survival horror game featuring both singleplayer and online co-op. When playing the singleplayer story, the player must find clues and solve puzzles to uncover the secrets hidden within the building. If you choose to play with up to two friends, the game turns into an escape horror game, and you must find one of multiple ways out of the building, utilizing items randomly hidden around the map. But beware, mistakes may alert creatures hiding behind every corner....

The setting

Crawling Silence is set in an old, long forgotten building shrouded in mystery, the secrets of which you must uncover.

But beware, various dangerous creatures may lurk in the dark...

The monsters you encounter while uncovering the secrets within the building have full access to vents, rooms and secret areas, so be cautious...

Solve riddles and find clues to advance in the story

Many elements of the game are puzzle based, both in story mode and online coop mode

Find hidden passages

There are various hidden doors and passages which you can discover, and maybe find helpful clues or items!

Additionally, you will discovery things that may be used for your advantage...

or they will turn against you, and force you to react quickly!

data.short_description: Uncover the mysteries of an old, long forgotten building with a dark past, or choose to try and escape the creatures lurking within it with friends! Crawling Silence features two main modes, a story mode and an online co-op mode.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 580
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains depiction of blood and gore.
